mapper.select: SELECT t1.projectno, xcoordinate, ycoordinate, averageprice, popularity, projectname, address FROM arc_project_coordinate t1 INNER JOIN arc_projectinfo t2 on t1.projectno = t2.projectno

SELECT t1.projectno, t1.projectname, t1.address, t1.corpno, t2.corpname, t1.bldnum, t1.coverarea, t1.plantotalarea, t1.plantotalinvest, t1.opendate, t1.admitdate, t1.salephoneno, t1.saleaddress FROM arc_projectinfo t1 INNER JOIN arc_corpinfo t2 on t1.corpno = t2.corpno WHERE t1.projectno = #{projectNo}
SELECT t1.presellno, t1.address, t1.bldfunction, t1.totalnum, t1.totalarea, t1.startdate, t1.stopdate FROM Per_BaseInfo t1 WHERE t1.projectno = #{projectNo}
